Texts.Chs: 他们被迫前往地下只是为了生存，法瑞图确实开始发生变化。在经过仅仅几千年的演变，它们开始展现出迄今为止星系中的任何已知生物都没有复制出的异常能力。
Texts.Eng: Forced underground just to survive, the Pharitu did indeed begin to change. Over the course of only a few thousand years, they begin to exhibit unusual capabilities that have thus far not been replicated by any known creatures in the galaxy.

Texts.Chs: 远古时期的法瑞图们处境艰难。他们的世界曾经平静，但由于未知的地质原因，而变成了已知宇宙中电性最强的地方之一。为了获得生存的机会，该物种只得在被迫的情况下迅速适应，否则就会面临灭绝的命运。
Texts.Eng: The Pharitu in ancient times had it rough. Their world was once calm, but due to unknown geological causes it moprhed into one of the most electrically potent places in the known universe. To stand a chance of survival the species was forced to adapt rapidly or face certain extinction.

Texts.Chs: 他们的思维拥有超凡的力量，通过摄取Shakta（一种天然的宝石，由他们生命纯粹的能量精华所构成）的能量就可以穿透大多数的石头，通过这种能量它可以“切割”进入石头中
Texts.Eng: Their minds possess exceptional powers capable of projecting through most stone when fueled by energy from their Shakta, the natural gem formations that contain the essence which fuels their lives. Through this energy they can 'cut' into stone

Texts.Chs: 并允许他们塑造石头的形状就像其他任何已知物种一样。关于这些生物能够通过雕塑创造美的故事怎么夸大都不为过：他们为不可能创造了边界。
Texts.Eng: allowing them the ability to shape it as no other known species can. Stories telling of the beauty these beings are able to create through sculpture cannot be overstated: what they can create borders on the impossible.
